Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bovine neutrophil beta-defensin 12  (bBD-12, BNBD-12, 3S=S, natural AMPs; UCSS1a;  cattle, ruminant, mammals; animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: BETA-DEFENSIN familiy: 13 peptides share a highly conserved consensus sequence potentially forming three disulfide bonds.Structure:  In the structural study (PDB), the first residue was Ala.You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Activity: diffusion assay: Active against E. coli ML35 and S. aureus 502A.Updated 7/2021; 12/2023
Literature Information.Author: Selsted ME, Tang Y-Q, Morris WL, McGuire PA, Novotny MJ, Smith W, Henschen AH, Cullor JS.1993
Literature Information.Title: Purification, primary structures, and antibacterial activities of beta-defensins, a new family of antimicrobial peptides from bovine neutrophils.
